name: Sasquatch
description: The legendary Bigfoot - a towering, powerful primate that can withstand tremendous punishment and hurl boulders at distant enemies.

abilities.name: Rock Throw
abilities.description: Hurls a massive boulder at a target area.

abilities.name: Ground Pound
abilities.description: Slams the ground, damaging and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Intimidating Roar
abilities.description: Releases a terrifying roar that causes enemies to flee.
